front.title: Datagram Congestion Control Protocol (DCCP) Encapsulation for NAT Traversal (DCCP-NAT)

abstract.t: This document specifies an alternative encapsulation of the Datagram Congestion Control Protocol (DCCP), referred to as DCCP-NAT. This encapsulation will allow DCCP to be carried through the current generation of Network Address Translation (NAT) middleboxes without modification of those middleboxes.
